title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText emits a beep sound when I choose SWT.MULTI. This behavior seems incorrect.
OB: When I choose the SWT.MULTI option, I observe that a Windows 'ding' sound is generated.
EB: I would expect that no sound is emitted when selecting the SWT.MULTI option.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the ControlExampleText application. 
2. Choose the SWT.MULTI option from the selection. 
3. Observe that a Windows 'ding' sound is emitted.
